content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:00 p.M. on the night of august 16th, 2008 my live-in girlfriend and myself stepped on the back patio to smoke.  i was looking at the stars and a very strange looking one got my attention.  i pointed at it and asked my girlfriend to tell me if there was anything strange about it she could see.  we both agreed that it was flashing green, red, blue and yellow.  we took a few pictures but can't see much because of the shakiness of our hands.  after about ten minutes of watching i walked to my brothers house to borrow a pair of binoculars.  he agreed that the star did seem peculiar and that it indeed seemed to flash different colors.  on the walk back to my girlfriends house i noticed that not only in the western sky but also in the south there was another of the same flashing stars.  with the same colors.  once i returned (gone aprox. 5 minutes)  we decided to sit on a hill next to our apartment building and watch for a while.  after aprox 10 minutes of nothing special happening. 2 jets flying too close to be civilian (in my opinion) flew east to west.  10 minutes after that a medium sized triangular (solid) object with 2 red lights on the back 2 corners (flashing) and a green flashing light in front flew east to southwest.  along with the previous lights mentioned.  i looked through the binoculars and could see that the interior of the craft was illuminated with a yellow light and that on top was a pole with a very very bright blueish/white flashing strobe.  the object flew at a moderate pace and made absolutely no noise whatsoever.  the triangle was in sight appoximately 1 1/2 - 2 minutes until we lost sight of it as it flew over the treeline.  5 minutes later as we were about to call it a night (one of the flashing starlike objects had disapeared over the treeline, however there was the original remaining)  we both seen a bright yellowish flash that was about the size of an aspirin.  as i told my g/f to take a picture it quickly dimmed and became very very small.  almost a pin-point sized yellow light and began floating to the right (east/north?)  after this a couple minutes later another jet just like the previous 2 flew east to west leaving a visible contrail.  5 minutes later we went inside and i recorded everything i had seen in writing.  that is all that i have to tell about it at the moment.  i dont believe i have left anything out but if something important does come to mind i will contact you.  i have no problems giving you a statement or anything that you may need.  i want to know the truth of whats going on with these crafts!  thank you for giving me a place to tell my story.
sincerely,
kevin
content.summary: 2 flashing star like objects in western and south/western skies.  black triangle with lights westward flightpath

content.detailedDescription:
Spotted an aerial stationary ring around 7:30-7:35pm driving via madison belt-line (route 12) heading north between old sauk rd. & greenway blvd. exits. the object piqued our curiosity enough to track it down. we drove through the nearby neighborhoods to locate a "source" on the ground and came upon a small neighborhood park (wexford park, madison, wi) where we parked almost directly beneath the object. we parked past the turn-around on the corner of n. westfield rd. & sawmill road facing north/northwest. the object was metallic in color, totally stationary and silent. it's metallic surface was darker in color and kind of shiny with the setting sun reflecting off on some parts. we looked around the general area where there were a few kids on bikes that rode by and seemed to not notice anything out of the ordinary. we thought it had to be some kind of kite or balloon but could not see any strings. after taking several photographs and with the lack of any attention we decided to leave.

we hadn't thought much of the sighting since until recently after sharing photographs with family. this evening we were then directed to view a similar object from sweden via a youtube video (http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=khyrgnp_uvk) which exhibits the exact same stationary behavior (the vehicle and video camera move but the object remains completely stationary), no visible source above, below or to the sides of the object.

we have a total of 19 photos of the object. the photographs show some slight angle differences which is due to moving the vehicle or to shifting inside of the passenger seat of the vehicle.

we're now kicking ourselves after seeing the sweden video since we left the object and didn't return to take video or use a better camera  to document (we used the iphone built-in camera).
content.summary: Completely stationary & silent metallic ring located above tree-line in madison neighborhood park.

content.detailedDescription:
I���m not sure of the date but i believe it to be in the late spring of 2004. my wife and i were vacationing in northern minnesota.

we had started our day getting our 27��� rv readied for the trip; we were first going to spend a couple days at a friend���s cabin in the isabella, mn. area and then i was intent on taking her to a spot i had camped in for years spending several days there just enjoying the remote calmness of the great northwoods.
as per usual, we found ourselves leaving much later in the day than we should have  and knowing we had to get to our first destination before nightfall as the area was more familiar to me during the day and i wanted to avoid driving around up there after dark.
we made it close to our destination as it was getting on towards dusk  and i decided to take a ���shortcut��� i had vaguely remembered in an effort to save time, i have only used this route a couple of times and only during the day. needless to say, we missed a turn and got semi ��� lost. having no map readily available, i decided to head back for the hiway and take my original route.
we finally got back to the highway about 45 minutes later and found our way back to our original route. by this time it was almost completely dark, only the last bit of orange sunlight left on the horizon which was rapidly giving way to a beautiful starry night that is one of the draws for me to the northwoods.
unfortunately i didn���t document the event as it was happening so i���m not too sure of the exact area we are in at the time. 
the event started as i was driving along guessing we had about 45 minutes to go before we got to the cabin. i noticed a round yellow / orange light to my left out the driver���s side window of our class ���c��� motor home, for those who don���t know the difference, a class ���a��� motor home looks like a box and a class ���c��� has a front end like a truck or van with a sleeper above the cab or drivers compartment.  
the light i was observing while trying to drive was larger than a star and about half the size that the full moon would generally appear on a night with no rain in site. i didn���t really think a lot of what i was looking at until i started making a gradual right turn to follow the road we were on. normally when you are looking at something out the left window and you start turning to the right the object in the window will move out of your view and behind you but in this case the object itself seemed to vanish before i completed the direction change and reappeared in front of us viewable through the upper right portion of the windscreen at a distance of approximately 500 ft.
my wife had taken notice of the object at the same time as i was pointing it out to her and she actually had a better view of it than i did as i was still trying to pay attention to the road and pull over and shut off the motor to better observe it.
at first after pulling over i watched for a few seconds to half a minute and decided that what i was watching was fireworks, just the plain yellow type like a mortar since the object seemed to be moving upwards towards an apex before descending. the object moved fairly slowly in its climb and then started a descent making a zigzag pattern leaving a brilliant trail of light in its wake. by this time i seriously doubted that i was watching fireworks and instead thought it might be a helicopter but quickly ruled that out since we were several miles from any kind of real civilization and with the windows down we literally heard no sound other than the usual sounds you would hear such as crickets.
the object continued to stay in its general location referenced by the windscreen as we sat quietly watching it make several moves to the right, left, up and down.  after about 10 minutes of this the object rose slowly and gracefully for a bit and what seemed to resemble sparks shot out of the top of the object and reconnect with it, then it started to move away but also seemed to vanish before it would have moved out of view, this seemed to be the end of the show  and we started up and slowly pulled away from our spot on the side of the road and out of the bottom right corner of the windscreen i observed a very small light closer to dark orange or red in color shoot off  towards the top left of the windscreen at a very high rate of speed  i guess it would have resembled a tracer round and moved as fast. i also remember getting a feeling that it was gone.
this was the last we saw of the object and we proceeded to enjoy a wonderful week in the northwoods without further incident. it was kind of funny, during the entire episode all i was thinking in my head was ���i don���t have time for this��� we only had a short time to be there and i didn���t want to spend it dealing with something like an abduction or missing time. also, i���m not sure what kept me from actually getting out of the motor home and getting a better look but i was compelled to stay right where i was. i had a camera but i didn���t think of it at the time plus i was too busy staring at the object and my adrenaline was flowing.
my wife has always been a skeptic and i was glad she had an opportunity to see this. i���m not sure if she���s a total convert or not but she got a better show than i did and seems to now believe.
we have since relocated to the general area of the sighting and have been fortunate enough to have a few other sightings but nothing like this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Circular or spherical shaped orange / yellow object

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the dog out for her last bathroom run in the back yard. when i turned to the south to go back in i noticed the light over roof of the house. i am familiar with the night sky in my area and this was a new light in the sky. even with my vision, i could notice it was flashing red, green, white. i took the dog back in and got my binoculars and continued to view the object. i went in the house and had my wife come to look at it. she saw it as well. after she left i continued to observe it for another 20 minutes. intermittent cloud cover moved in and obscured the stars, but the object was still visible. it was apparently below cloud level. after watching for another 15-20 mins. the light suddely vanished. i waited until a break in the clouds and located the surrounding stars, but the flashing light was gone.

the light was approximately 25-30 degrees above the south horizon. it was below and west of the bright planet approximately 40 degrees above the south horizon.
 
the flashing light was not as bight as the planet or the full moom, but bright enough to stand out and be seen by me. there are no towers with flashing lights in that part of the sky.
content.summary: Stationary, bright light flashing red, green, white

content.detailedDescription:
Was walking on the track on the field at east providence senior high school on pawtucket ave, in the city of east providence, rhode island.  i was completing a lap around the track, when i noticed a black sphere approaching from the south west and traveling in a north easterly direction.

i stopped walking and paused to see what type of bird, plane, rocket or ballon. as i was looking at this thing i was trying to figure out what it could be.  it took me about 10 seconds to rule out an eagle or hawk, and another 15 seconds to rule out a ballon, and as the sphere go closer it was obvious that it wasn't a helicopter, there was no thumphing sound or loud turbine sound, the object did make a sound but it wasn't a sound that i can reference to anything i have heard before.

the sphere was travelling at a speed around 250 miles per hour and it was travelling in a horizontal linear path.  the black metallic sphere was traveling below cloud cover and at an attitude that i have commonly seen commercial airplanes taking when they pass over east providence and heading to green air port in warwick rhode island.  

as i 
as the sphere was approaching it appeared to pass over the adjacent ball fields of providence country day school, as such the sphere had to pass over the pawtucket ave and waterman ave intersection, pawtucket ave is a north to south ave and waterman ave intersects pawtucket ave in an east to west  direction.

after the black metallic sphere passed over the providence country day fields in passed directly over the east providence base ball field which is situated immediately south of the foot ball field and track.  as i was standing on the track i could clearly see the object as a solid metallic sphere that appeared to be black, could have been dark grey.

the metallic sphere appeared to be travelling under intelligent control.
the metallic sphere travelled in a linear path, it didn't veer left or right.  there was no vapor trail behind the object, and there were no wings  or anything projecting from the sphere.

in terms of size the metallic sphere was a little bigger than a drum on a cement truck, for example the cylinder on a cement truck that is the container for  cement/concrete.

the metallic sphere passed high over the trees on the first base side of the east providence base ball field, as it did you could see the sun reflect off the top of the sphere and the top of the sphere reflected the sun light with a mirror type of reflection, the sun rerlecting off of the metallic sphere last a few seconds.

the sphere continued travelling in a north eastern direction over commerical way and headed in the direction of taunton ave (rte 44).

i proceeded to walk around the track and comptemplating what i just saw and was considering the possibilities.  after 15 minutes had elapsed since the metallic sphere passed over head, a commerical airliner was passing over head in and heading in a south westerly trek, basically flying pass the same area that the metallic sphere had been seen give or take 200-300 yards or so.  the commerical airliner was silver in color and had a  red color horzontial stripe running the lenght the the plane, this appeared to be a 747.

would say that the airliner passed over the school grounds between 1:30-1:40. 

there is a national guard branch that is situated adjacet to green air port in warwick rhode island.  maybe the metallic sphere is some sort of national guard drone performing some kind of surveilance mission? i would like to know what this could have been.  certaintly someone else should have seen this sphere, there were plenty of cars on the road when i left the high school parking lot it was a beautiful saturday and people were no doubt around and about.
content.summary: Metallic sphere

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were on vacation in tempe arizona and decided to go to sedona for the day. while at the catholic church built in the rock in sedona i saw a flash in the sky, a reflection from the sun. i grabbed my camera and started taking pictures. i was only able to get one shot. i waited until now because this was my third sighting and not until what i saw on august 10th at 10:14pm did i realize that we are seen more ufo���s now than ever.

my first sighting was october 10, 1985 driving to dinner in tempe, az 
heading north on scottsdale blvd. and the radio dj breaks in and announces that academy award director, writer, actor, producer george orsen welles has died at the age 70.

no more than 2-5 minutes later the same dj breaks in the middle of a song and starts talking about 3 lights over north phoenix, in the perfect shape of a triangle. a red light on top, yellow/orange light on the right and a blueish green light on the left. as my girlfriend at the time, (now my wife of 21 years and at my side for every sighting) and i drove up scottsdale rd we saw the lights. trying to keep the car straight and looking up at the same time (i don���t recommend this to anyone who sees a ufo, pull over and look) there it is, hundreds of people calling it in the radio station, police station, and the airport, then a few minutes later, its gone. the top light goes straight up and the two bottom lights go opposite directions, one to the east and the other to the west. simultaneously the lights disappear, so fast that you could not see anything or follow any of them.
content.summary: Disk shape very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving westwards along the m4 motorway approaching the membury services just west of swindon, wiltshire, uk. this is edge of uk crop circle country.

as the motorway dipped down i saw directly in my line of sight in the sky ahead a large white object. the object was flying as if it was flapping, or undulating, a bit like a manta ray might swim underwater, and was following a slightly erratic path, not direct. it did not have flapping wings, rather the object itself seemed to be undulating.

it was a long way away (a mile maybe) but was quite clearly visible so must have been very large, about the size of a passenger plane. it was travelling horizontally at about the same speed as a plane from south to north ie from left to right across the motorway. i remember thinking that i must keep my eyes on the object because i felt it was just going to disappear, and i wanted to be actually looking at the object at the time that it disappeared. i watched it for about 10 seconds before it did vanish very suddenly, leaving no trace behind or any indication of where it had gone. there was a thick bank of high level cloud, but the object was flying below this, and there were no individual clouds beneath the bank for it to fly behind. it just vanished.

the most significant thing about this ufo sighting for me was the manner of flight, ie the undulating motion, together with its sudden disappearance.
content.summary: M4 wiltshire: large white ufo flying in undulating manner which disappeared suddenly without trace.

content.detailedDescription:
I often monitor earthquakes and volcano's and i took a high def screenshot of the mountain and see a "object" hovering above the mountain,i asked my wife her opinion just to make sure i wasnt just seeing things and she agrees it is a large solid object. websit is here i hope its still therte when you see this,please contact me if you see the same thing

http://www.Fs.Fed.Us/gpnf/volcanocams/msh/views/static-highdef-medium.Php
content.summary: Webcam of mt st helens

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:30am on sunday morning my husband and i were ready to go to bed. he was laying downstairs on the couch and i went ahead upstairs to let our 2 dogs out. there was what seemed to be a full moon, although it may have acutally been the full moon the night before. either way, it was very bright out. it was a clear and cool morning in licking county (newark, oh) and i was looking, as i usually do when i let the dogs out before bed, out into the night sky. i usually scan the sky and star gaze while waiting for the dogs to return. because of the clear and cool weather i stood with the door open. 

our property has an unobstructed view of the sky except for a row of pine trees on the east that separates us and our neighbors. through the opening in the trees i notice a bright light. it was so bright it caught my eye and i looked towards it. at first, i thought it was a plane and took a double take to see which way it was headed, yet it didn't move. i thought it looked to bright to be a star, and it was then i stepped out to investigate further. upon stepping onto the back patio, i moved to where the pine tree line was no longer interfering in the line of sight. 

at this point a bright flash came off the object and i could see very clearly red, white and blue lights rotating on what seemed to be a disc like object. unable to believe what i was seeing, i ran back in and shouted down to my husband to come up. i told him to look up in the sky and tell me what he saw. about 20 minutes had elapsed at this point and the object was spinning and flashing, but it didn't move until my husband appeared. at this point, approximately 1 am, the object began quickly zig zagging back and forth in the sky and it would then stop briefly and hover. my husband when inside to get a camera and a telephoto lense to see if we could see it closer. during the 3 minutes or so while he was away, there were three streaks of light. two streaks of light seemed to "drip" off the object. there was about ten seconds between each drip. they fell straight down and then about 5 seconds after the second drip straight down, another shot off the right side of the object.

i shouted for my husband to hurry back. he came running out and held the telephoto lense up on the camera for us to look through--but he couldn't get the full charged camera to work. the lenns did make the shape of the object and the colors even clearer. i was stunned at what i was seeing. i am definately a skeptic. i've always believed there is something perhaps we can't explain and thought there may very well be someplace in the vastness of this universe or another that something may exist. but never ever in my wildest dreams did i think i'd bare witness to it! my husband on the other hand was thrilled, as he is quite a believer in ufos. i honestly was sure when i originally called him up that he was going to tell me it was a plane or have some other logical explaination because i just couldn't believe what i was seeing was real. 
we both quickly realized there was no other explaination. 

he tried to take photos of the object while i continued to watch it. until approximately 1:30am, this object stayed relatively stationary apart from the odd zig zag pattern. then about 1:40 am there was a point of light travelling out from behind our neighbors to the north's tree line--approximately 1000 feet from where we were standing. it moved upwards and sideways to the northeast towards the first object we'd seen. it took approximately 30-40 minutes to reach the first object. the second object we dicovered up looking through the lens was also flashing red white and blue. once it got within what seemed like a fingers width (from where we were orientated) there was a bright flash and they were both gone.

i watched stunned and shocked at what i'd just seen and how long it lasted. with being a skeptic, i wasn't sure if what i'd just seen was a normal sighting or something quite extraordinary since it lasted so long. either way, for me personally, it was extraordinary, because i would have never thought such a thing would happen to me. i definately didn't feel scared. i was more curious and like i said, shocked, to believe this was actually what i thought it was.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strangeness in the northern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving the it's a grind coffee house, located at tustin ave. and la palma ave in the anaheim hills area, at close to 6:00pm. as i got to the parking lot exit, i was facing north. that is when my attention was brought to what appeared at first to be a meteor, exploded plane, missile, or some such thing falling from the sky, about 45 degrees to my left, being northeast of my position. initially, it was quite alarming to me because of the all the possibilities of what it might be, none of them good.

a cold winter storm had just passed through, and low, dark, broken clouds from the tail end of the storm were present. clouds were low and broken, but air was very clear.

as i watched, it deduced from the path, speed, and size that the object would almost certainly hit the ground, in a heavily poulated urban area. i first saw the object come down at a steep angle well above the clouds, and expected to see it punch through the clouds and hit the ground. my mind went through the short list of things it could be. i hoped it was not a ballistic missile, as it might be the last thing i would ever see. i hoped it was not a plane that had exploded, or a large meteorite. the object entered the top of some cold, thick, dark scud clouds, but instead of punching through and continuing on to hit the ground, it instantaneously stopped cold, just at or below the bottoms of the clouds. at that point i knew i was definitely not seeing a meteor, plane, or missile. nothing moving that fast, falling from the sky stops on a dime and just hovers like that.

as i watched, the object began to appear larger, perhaps hundreds of feet across, and glow brilliantly with a most pure light. it appeared huge, because it was miles away, appearing in the northeast, approximately over the hills north of fullerton, or over brea. almost instantly, what i thought was one object, appeared to become two. it seems like the second one very quickly joined the first, but i do not recall seeing but one object falling, trailing what appeared to be flames, or glowing plasma.

as i watched in amazement, an airplane and a helicopter quickly converged on the objects. the speed at which they did this was uncanny, almost like they knew it was coming. but maybe they just happened to be right there, as the skies in this area are always quite busy. the airplane then arrived on the scene and circled the two objects very closely, while the hleicopter stood off a bit further away, bobbing and weaving about, also investigating. i would think that both the plane and the helicopter pilots must have gotten very good, up-close looks at these objects, and probably photos and/or video. i was amazed by how tight the circles were that the airplane was able to execute, and how much larger the objects appeared to be than the plane. i estimate that the objects were at least 5 times bigger, or more, than the wingspan of the plane.

the whole bizarre affair, the two brilliant, large, hovering objects, the circling plane, and the inquisitive helicopter all started moving slowly to the northeast, against prevailing winds, and moved below my sightline until they were obscured by buildings and trees in my location. i decided then to give chase, zig zag my way across town, and try to keep the objects in view for as long as possible. i got onto tustin ave, headed north, went left on la palma, west, to miller, where i went right, north, to orangethorpe, and headed west again a mile or two. i estimate my travel at 3 miles. i managed to keep them in view most of the time, but had to stop at a traffic light on orangethorpe.

stopped at the light with my head and shoulders sticking out of the window of my car, looking over the roof, i watched the objects simply blink out, like someone turning off a light switch. the impression i had was that they had actually left the scene at incredible speed, making them appear to simply blink out and literally disappear. 

the plane that was circling them did one or two more circles, but there was nothing there anymore to see, so it, and the helicopter both broke off their investigations. the plane headed southeast, and by chance, flew directly over me at a fairly low altitude. it appeared to be a medium sized twin engine jet. it was low enough for it's underside to be dimly illuminated by the glow from the city lights. it may have been military, but i cannot say with any certainty.

i said nothing to anyone for 3-4 day, until i saw a large number of reports of the same exact incident being posted online, on brian vike's website. i then posted my initial report there. i was amazed at how consistent al lthe reports were, and how they all described exactly what i witnessed. brian vike contacted me and we have spoken on two occassions since. i have not spoken and have never met any of the other witnesses.

i would thinlk that it would be of paramount importance to get the radar data and flight plans of any aircraft in the area to determine exactly who was flying the plane and the helicopter that were involved in this sighting, and to verify the plane circling the objects, if not the objects themselves. it would be great to identify and interview the pilots, and see if they have any photos or video. i am not aware of any pilots filing any reports, so whoever they are, to my knowledge, they have yet to come forward and tell what they saw, up close and personal.

a foia for the radar data and all flight plans putting aircraft in that area at that time are in order. the plane and helicopter should have had transponders, because of the heavy air traffic in the area and proximity to fullerton and the main approach to john wayne airports.
content.summary: Bright objects fell from sky trailing flame-like plasma, then stopped suddenly, and hovered.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in sun porch, facing ssw having a cigarette with the common law partner.
we both noticed a bright orange to yellow light moving slowly in nne direction.
a bright orange yellow lighted spherical flying object no more than 1200 feet above ground when first observed, and absolutely no sound whatsoever, that made an abrupt change in direction to turn to the ese and speeded up in a rapid climb until faded out of sight. 
observed by both of us and the next door neighbour.
this is second sighting, the first being ausgust 3, 2008 at 10:16pm. at the time of this first sighting, i had a distinct feeling and impression that i would see it again. this second sighting was not as exciting as the first because of my expectation. difference this time is that at least 3 people observed this object.
after object turned to ese, there was a fairly rapid rate of climb to over 7500 feet above ground and faded quickly into the distance above a tree. line of sight and height of tree used to estimate height above ground when object faded from view.
content.summary: Bright yellow-orange at first, then white orange circular disc/oval shape with south-southwest to north-northeast trajectory with abrupt right turn to ese to disappearance,

content.detailedDescription: After having worked overtime, i headed down 79th st, a four lane highway eastbound in justice, illinois at 88th avenue.  i stopped at stop light and noticed a round, silver metallic vehicle which was sitting in a cemetary (bethania or ressurection, not sure of name).  it appeared to be approzimately 25 feet or so in diameter and about 7 feet tall.  it had a middle section which was flat and raised and had probably a dozen white lights about 1 ft. in diameter which appeared to be pulsing constantly.  as there were no other vehicles on the road which i noticed at the time, i was alarmed by what i saw and didn't stop again when the street light turned green.  i left the scene and continued another few miles to my residence in burbank, il.  i did pay attention the next day when i went to work and saw that the grassy area where i saw the vehicle parked appeared to have a black, oily or charred appearance as if the area was burned up.  the shape of the area was definitely round and for at least another dozen years the grass never changed appearance which has led me to think that the area must have been chemically altered in some fashion.  i always look at the spot whenever i happen to be in the area and since the event, i believe it has been paved.  i will always be sorry because i never attempted to call the cemetary's management to relate these details to them.  i would like to say that in this small area of the cemetary, i have never seen any gravesites as it is in the northeast corner of the highway.  i also need to elaborate on the fact that the vehicle was within 100 feet of me so i could see it very plainly even though it was about 3 am and fairly dimly lit.  my belief has always been that it was probably in that exact spot because of possible examination of recently deceased humans.
content.summary: Spotted ufo approx. 100 ft. from four lane hwy. in cemetary.  had lights flashing around rim of craft.

content.detailedDescription: While attending a calvin simmons concert at the concord pavilion in august of 1982, (we were seated on the grass), i felt an urge to look up, and when i did, i saw a very large triangular object hovering motionless immediately overhead.  there were no lights on the object, it was gray in color, the bottom surface appeared to cover a maze of  pipes or something, and it made a ocellateing sound, something similar to an electric motor. i immediately thought of something that was other worldly. it was not a plane or helicopter, it was the largest thing i have ever seen in the sky, other than moons or planets. it scared me and when i spoke of it to the lady i was with, she said with a calmness that upsets me now when i think of it, "don't get excited."  those words chilled me, and i sat back down and looked up again immediately, and the object just flew away without making another sound, and it was gone in an instant.  what is even more disturbing, is the fact that my lady friend and i never spoke of the incident, not to this day.  in fact we hardly spoke at all that night, not during the concert, or the long ride home to san francisco.  i forgot about what happened for years.  when i remembered and mentioned it to friends, i was generally laughed at, so i stopped talking about it.  for some time after that concert, i would awaken with bruses  on my arms, and i would have strange recurring dreams of being half awake, with someone in my bedroom (by this time i was separated from my lady friend).  i never saw or spoke with anyone or anything, and no one spoke to me that i can recall, yet when i would wake up, i had the distinct feeling that someone or something had been in my home, and i had no explanation for the bruises on my arms.  the bruises were shaped like someone with very strong fingers had been holding my arms very tightly.  it has been several years since i have found any bruises on my body, but i have had the feeling that someone or something has been in my bedroom while i was sleeping during the past two years.
content.summary: I suddenly became aware of a very large object hovering overhead that made an electrical humming sound

content.detailedDescription:
I'm the president of brazilian ufology center in brazil.

the picture and the footage was made by luis braga who sent it to me.

i also interviewed him. he told me this fact.

i'm an amator photographer. i was waking up early and it was still dark because i would like to take the picture of the borning sun.

i was with my camera with me.

when i was leaving my house i just saw a strange object andi started to shoot it. i made three pictures and than i turned my camera to video to try to do a footage.

those are the pictures i have and the footage.

the object speed was realy fast. more than 1.500km/h.

the object trajectory was not a line. it was almost a line, but it did some turns.

the object wasn't to high. it n the same position like a plane in the sky.

my sight had 34 seconds. 12 seconsds is my footage, and the rest of the time i used to make the pictures.

please, see attached the film and the footage. 

i really would like to know if i shot an ufo. can you help me.

in the footage all you can here is my breathing and the chicks i have in my back yard.


now i'm asking mufon opinion in this case. can you help us in brazil.

our website is http://www.Cubbrasil.Net

say hi to my friend mr. james carrion.

all the best,

milton frank
brazilian ufology center president
content.summary: I saw the ufo and i shot it.

content.detailedDescription:
Indiana; hamilton county, southeast. 5:04 pm local time.

i was outside relaxing and watching birds and planes with my binoculars. magnification 16x. a large wide body jet with 4 engines on the wing and a back swept rear tail passed overhead. i was watching it move overhead with my binoculars. after this jet passed from north to south i noticed another jet passing from west to east across the prior jets path. i started watching it with my binoculars. as this second jet moved, i noticed a dark spot directly above it that was hovering. thinking it was another plane i watched to determine its direction. as i watched i could see a bright center on the object which was not moving laterally in the sky but appeared to be getting larger or descending toward me. as the image became larger i could see the sun reflecting off of its silvery side. it was cylindrical shaped. on the bottom of the cylinder was a very bright aqua-blue to blue "spot-type" light.

because the cylinder was getting large enough to film, i quickly went into the house to get my video camera (as the object was getting larger and apparently heading toward me). it took no more than 60 secs to get the camera and return outside. unfortunately, the object was gone. i looked all arround and no object was visible.

i felt like it was reading my mind and became camera shy? wow, go figure. i really wish i could have gotten a video of it.

i'll keep watchin........
content.summary: Descending silver cylinder with aqua-blue spot light on bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was up near the local mcdonald's, getting me some food since i had the munchies and i saw this thing shooting along.  it didn't make a noise at all, and i was scared so bad that i lost my desire to eat.  it flew along in a straight line that looked like it was going down a little bit.  after watching the object for maybe a minute and a half it disappeared behind some trees.
content.summary: Luckily, i had my camera

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my dining room with the window and shades open, and i was recording a song playing guitar onto my imac computer using garageband when i looked out to see an airplane going in a south to north track.  we live about ten miles from detroit metro airport, so this is not unusual.  what was unusual was i saw two metallic silver balls circling the aircraft at about one thousand feet from it.  the airplane was roughly three thousand feet in the sky, and the two silver craft were looping around it in a smooth, effortless oval/circular pattern. i could not tell the size of the craft.  all of the sudden, the two silver metallic crafts stopped moving and hovered completely still for about thirty seconds.  i called my fiance jessica from my cell phone that was on my desk because i needed to know if she had the digital camera on her.  she did, and was shopping about three miles away from our house.  i did not take my eyes off of the crafts.  she said that she had it with her, and my blackberry 8830 worldphone does not have a camera built in. we hung up and she headed home home. i walked outside of my house into the backyard and they were still stationary.

the sky was clear blue with no clouds in i, and the two silver craft started to move slowly toward the detroit river, which is east from the first location i saw them.  one of the crafts started to circle the other craft at a medium rate of speed, taking about twenty seconds to complete one revolution.  after about a minute of this, the moving crafts speed increased until it took about five seconds to complete the rotation.  it did three more rotations, and they merged into one object.  a second object, a white cylinder appeared and was flying sideways toward it.  it then increased in speed and then shot away in less than one second.

i felt warmth and heard a high pitched hum in my body, like i was being scanned.  i have felt this before on my second sighting about twenty years ago.  it is not a comfortable feeling at all.

the silver craft hovered motionless for about thirty more seconds, and started to move in a south easterly path. there were some birds that flew over, and justified that what i was looking at was not a bird.  the craft started to pick up speed, and slowly headed south over the wyandotte shores golf course, and vanished.  my fiance returned home about thirty seconds later, and we looked for them for a few minutes, to no avail.

these craft looked like the craft that jose escamilla showed in his film "the greatest story ever denied", when he was demonstrating how today's cameras can see ufo's using a simple night shot on during the daytime.

this was my fifth sighting in my life.  the first in 1978 here in wyandotte at the same location.  the second was in 1989 in coldwater michigan over coldwater lake, michigan where multiple people saw an orange cylinder hovering over the lake at 1:00am. the third was in 2003 in australia when i was on the live aboard dive boat "mike ball's spoilsport" where multiple people saw a green horseshoe shaped craft come out of the water at a very high rate of speed and shot up into space. the fourth sighting happened in october of 2007 again at my coldwater lake cottage where my friend bill, my fiance jessica, and myself witnessed an orange teardrop shaped object split into as many as four parts, and then merged back together, and disappeared after twenty minutes into the distance.
content.summary: Wyandotte michigan multiple craft sighting

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to a church to do the air conditioning service when i noticed this object moving slowly over the trees.  at first i thought it was a blimb of some kind but it had nothing hanging under it as blimbs do.  i shot these pics and saved them to my computer but was in dought of what to do with them.
content.summary: I noticed this moving over the trees slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the flight line at the houma airport taking pictures of helicopters in the morning mist. examining the picture later i noticed what seems to be two contrails of objects moving from right to left. one (the lower) seems to be generated by a disc-shaped cloud. the other seems to be generated by something in the clouds that has a row of lights.

i took this photo myself with a new digital camara and it has not been altered in any way. i insist on exclusive ownership of this photo and it cannot be reproduced without my permission.

the more i look at it the harder it is for me to think that it is a natural phenomena.
content.summary: Attached picture seems to show two disc shaped objects with contrails

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on i-580 in livermore,ca. i seen something shine in the sky and i looked and thought what the "f" is that. it was a silver, metallic,oval disc like object.  i was driving so i had to keep looking at the road, and when i looked away and looked back i could'nt see it anymore. i was thinking what was that and where did it go? it was west north west at about 45 degrees in the sky, and 40 miles away.
content.summary: Driving west on 580 in livermore,ca

content.detailedDescription:
At  04:50 cst in bolingbrook, il i was standing outside on my deck when i saw a vapour trail with two white alternating blinking lights shooting straight up from the western sky, then seemed to arc over and head straight in the ne direction. 

as the craft passed quietly overhead, the white alternating blinking lights emitted a red blinking light from left to right and then back to white, repeating the sequence.
the shape of the aircraft looked to be triangular, with an additional steady but dimmer white light under the body.  approximate total time aircraft was in sight was 7 minutes.
content.summary: Triangle shaped with two lights towards the front and one on the end.  all on the underbody

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking when i noticed a star like object in the sky to the west-southwest about 5 miles from my location putting it almost over the city of dublin. it was a cloudy night & the moon was very bright there where no stars visible & this object was fairly close to me & the ground. it flashed a few times moved back & forth stopped & just sat for awhile before repeating it's earlier activity. then it slowly moved away directly to the west. towards the comanche county/lake proctor area. the whole incident was about 20 minutes long & had noticed similiar object(s) in the sky earlier in the evening just before sundown except that object from earlier that evening did all the smae movements but it slowly dropped to the ground & dissapeared from my view to the northwest.
content.summary: Star like object moving back & forth then stationary...

content.detailedDescription: This evening aug 15, 2008, backyard nearly dark at about 10:00pm clear night stargazing for a bit, wife was startled seeing what she thought was a shooting star at first. at nearly the same moment looking in about the same direction i caught it north about 30 degrees up from the horizon.  an extremely bright object appeared seemingly out of nowhere like a flash bulb that didn't turn off.  in a matter of seconds it seemed to accelerate??? climbing a few degrees higher and vanished ( no joke, i���m a skeptic and show me the evidence science kind of guy, but think sci-fi movie where object appears in and out of warp speed as it jumps, sorry, only sane way i can even describe it).  this object was twice if not three times the size and brightness off the scale of any planet or star we've ever observed in the idaho night sky.  wife has a slightly different interpretation seeing it a fraction of a second before i did and said it seemed to pulse in spurts then accelerate and vanish.  no noise, no afterburner, if landing lights from a plane, object was moving in the opposite direction (seen landing lights come into and out of view, a much slower event).  no red or green nav lights, just incredibly bright white orb that seemed to come out of nowhere. a plane flew over the house a minute later confirming the extreme difference with what we had just witnessed.  we stared dumb founded and afterwards looked at each other in disbelief.  we have seen both military (gowen field, mountain home air base) and commercial (boise) aircraft fly over the house for many years and this was like nothing we'd ever seen before.  read recent reports before filing this.  i was struck by a few that were very similar particularly with��� 2008-08-11 bright round white light flashed only once among the stars. mn, us���.  i don���t know what we saw, but it was no aircraft i���ve ever seen nor was it a meteor because it went up not down.
content.summary: Extremely bright object appeared seemingly out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription:
truly dont know what i saw. i was walking my dog in what we call the 'green belt' down by the power lines. there is a small bike path there. as we were walking, too ladies and a small dog were walking the other way and talking to each other in spanish. i thought they were looking at me and tyler my pup, but they were looking at the sky. i walked past them, smiled and crossed the street. i looked back at them and then and looked up to see what they were staring at. thats when i saw it. two discs that seemed to hover and at the same time, "flip" slowy end over end. scale would have been the size of a small car in my opinion, slightly larger possibly. they seemed to just hover and move horizontal to each other in oposite directions. one seemed to leave rather quickly. i basicly looked at my dog, looked back up and one was just gone. the other one seemed to move slowly up and away, moving northeast until it was gone about 10 seconds. 

   i took note that there were clouds but not anywhere near these things. they were absolutley not planes, balloons, blimps, helicopters or anything else i've ever seen... and not sure where to report something like this. all i can say is that they were clearly round. clearly there. clearly hovering... and clearly nothing i have ever seen in my life. any ideas??

                                 -dave
content.summary: Two 'fliping' silver/white discs. hovering for 15 mins and then gone...

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my chair that i sit in quiet time every night. i heard a low roar to the south that was blocked by a tree. i got up and walked around the tree to see what it was and saw a large oblong object going very slow almost hovering in the sky. it turned from a south to north direction and heaed west. it made a very low rumbling roar loader than most planes. it was also going slower than most planes. it was 3 to 4 times larger than a 737. it lasted approximately 40 to 45 seconds. it had 3 to four lights in a row and had no wings on it. it was quite a shock of seeing it. i stood there for several seconds and then started trying to get my wife to come outside to see it. i was running down the road to try and keep it in sight.
content.summary: Saw flying object over house

content.detailedDescription: Ive been seeing these balls of light in the sky for atleast 6 years...I videotaped some of them and stuck them on youtube,,look under //gibson 2007 ufo/....Theselast for seconds and dim out and multiply..
content.summary: Orange balls of light dimming and reappearing

content.detailedDescription: Arrived at cresson, texas oil field yard at 4:45am. i was waiting for a pump truck due to my job description in the oil business. i decided to drop the tailgate portion of my truck and relax in the bed of the truck and look at the stars while waiting for the other pump trucks to arrive. there was no visible light in the area to due the place being in the middle of the country, so the sky was clear and you could see numerous stars in the sky along with typical constellations. as i observed the night sky for a duration of approximately  2 minutes, when all of a sudden one star in particular, started to move westward at a slow rate. after a minute and 30 seconds passed, the object began to move in the zig-zag like movement in the same direction, and came to a stop after 2 minutes. the object was stationary for about 5 minutes, then it started moving in a straight line in a westward direction. after the initial movement again, is proceeded to make a 180 degree turn in the opposite direction in a semi circular like fashion and proceeded to continue in a east direction for 2 in a half minutes, almost to where it initially was to begin with. at this time, the pump trucks had arrived and my star gazing was interrupted, as i had to continue on with my work day. i wanted to write this to inquire about any other sightings of this event. i also covered up one eye to view it with the opposite in order to dispel any forms of an optical illusion.
content.summary: Fast mobile flying star like object

content.detailedDescription: I lived in texas i was visiting my mom in cedar rapids iowa.  i went out to dump her trash in a dumpster.  when  i lifted the lid i noticed the stars were disaperaring.  i put the lid down kept looking up and noticed that it was a huge, all the stars were starting to show up after it moved.  it was very quite. it had 3 light blueish lights.  so i ran in to get my mom to see it.  by the time i got her out side it was gone.  no one belives me but i know what i saw!  i have seen 747s i have seen the space shuttle pigy backed on a plane!  the object i saw made them look like a toy.  the one that they show on programs looks just like it but the lights were diffrent.  i've always wondered how big the stealth is and is it quite.  also can it fly slow?  i'm not crazy, people look at me like, sure a yeh ok!  this has bothered me since 1981.  thanks i hope one day the one i saw or others will be proven.
content.summary: Black triangle, 3  blueish lights. quiet, bigger than a plane very wide

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in new haven, connecticut on prospect street at the time. i was just about to get into the shower when there was a terrible banging on the door. i was told to get outside quickly. i rushed outside and a family friend who had left our home shortly before, saw this in the sky while driving home & rushed back to our home. he thrust his finger into the air "look!" 
there just above the 20ft tall pines, in the sky was an object about the size of a football field. it was massive and so low to the ground, if i were in the tree, i am sure i could have touched it! it seemed to glide over us, slowly. all the way around the perimeter of the object, there were multicolored lights, these lights were not bright to look at, i mean they seemed to have a haze over them, so that even though the ufo was so close, it did not hurt your eyes to look directly at them. it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen in my life. it made a deep but not terribly loud hummmmmmmm. i have never heard that sound before or again, it was captivating.
i could hear neighbors yelling in the streets, it was clear that many were witnessing this. after it had passed, i ran into the house to the second floor and looked out the window but could no longer see it, far in the distance i could see white lights, several but could not distinguish what they were.
i have told my story only to family. i was just 14 at the time. every time i hear about a ufo sighting (there was a recent event in ct witnessed by dozens)i am not skeptical, i know they exist.
content.summary: Sighting in new haven

content.detailedDescription:
Two japanese friends and me were walking along the sidewalk of landgrafgeorgstrasse, near jugendstilbad. one of the japanese friend sighted something in the sky that looks like an ufo. i said it could be an aeroplane, but she said aeroplane does not travel so slow. we noticed a flying object flying steadily and gently from west to east across the sky. it has a large mild orange light at the rear end, covering the whole rear-bottom part of the body. about ten seconds later we sighted there are actually two of them, seemingly identical, one followed another. their separating distance is about 20 of themselves. they travelled in the same fashion. 
we were surprised.  i felt very comfortable and peaceful with the calm way they are moving. i took a couple of pictures and a video with my digital camera. because it was too dark and i was zooming in to capture them, and because they were already moving away from us while i am taking, the picture may not be in very good quality. 
while we had sighted the ufo, i also asked two persons standing at the entrance of a bar if it is a ufo. they seemed not to believe so. also, there was a man walking behind us and he also took some pictures of them. 
we lose sight of the objects when they travelled away from us and disappear behind the clouds in the sky, just like an aeroplane. 
i would like to know if they really are ufos. if not, i am interested to know what they are actually.
content.summary: Two ufos slowly flying on the sky.
